items.sentence: If Tom had been wearing his seat belt, he wouldn\'t have been injured so badly.
I\'d like to go through just one day without being told I look like my brother.
It\'s been raining heavily since this morning, so I don\'t want to go anywhere.
I like pigs. Dogs look up to us. Cats look down on us. Pigs treat us as equals.
I don\'t think I\'ll ever sound like a native speaker no matter how much I try.
If it looks like an apple and it tastes like an apple, it\'s probably an apple.
Tom wasn\'t looking at Mary, but he was listening to everything she was saying.
Tom and I could\'ve saved ourselves a lot of time by just doing that ourselves.
Tom assumed Mary was talking nonsense simply because he didn\'t understand her.
Tom apparently hasn\'t yet told Mary that he\'s planning to drop out of school.
